name: LAB
description:
Deep underground in an old laboratory, an animal wakes up.

Invisible enemies blocking the way, complex old underground facilities, narrow ducts...
Lead the helpless lone animal to escape to the ground floor.

Introduction:.
The game is about escaping from underground.
Invisible enemies lurk in the intricate old underground facilities.
Lead the impotent fox to the surface by your hand.

The controls are very simple. All you have to do is run, fly, and kick.
However, even if you kick, it is an ineffective kick and does not become an attack.
Use various footholds to sneak forward without being seen by the enemy.
If you are discovered, run away to a safe place as fast as you can.
